hints.content:
$\purpleD{153} = {\greenD{?}}-\goldE{372}$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point question mark back to point 153 is labeled, minus 372.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4fe9a267221f17c157144ace439518a7f116b890)

What number can we subtract $\goldE{372}$ from and be left with $\purpleD{153}?$

We can add $\goldE{372}$ to $\purpleD{153}$ to find the missing number.

$\begin{align}\goldE{372}&\\
\underline{+ \purpleD{153}} &\\
\greenD{525}&\end{align}$

![The same number line as above, with the question mark replaced with 525 and an arrow from 153 to 525 labeled plus 372](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/123159dd5862f9be060414a4dc8e03fb58802e40)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?**

$153 = {}$ [[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] ${} - 372$
